net.adamcin.httpsig.ssh.jce

Class SSHKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.httpsig.ssh.jce.SSHKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Key, FingerprintableKey

    public final class SSHKey
extends Object
implements FingerprintableKey
    Default Key implementation for OpenSSH-compliant keys (RSA/DSA)

      • verify

        public boolean verify(Algorithm algorithm,
             byte[] challengeHash,
             byte[] signatureBytes)
        Verifies the signatureBytes against the challengeHash using an underlying public key
        Specified by:
        verify in interface Key
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the selected Signature Algorithm
        challengeHash - the result of RequestContent.getContent(java.util.List, java.nio.charset.Charset)
        signatureBytes - the result of Authorization.getSignatureBytes()
        Returns:
        true if signature is valid

      • sign

        public byte[] sign(Algorithm algorithm,
          byte[] challengeHash)
        Signs the challengeHash using the specified signature Algorithm
        Specified by:
        sign in interface Key
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the selected Signature Algorithm
        challengeHash - the result of RequestContent.getContent(java.util.List, java.nio.charset.Charset)
        Returns:
        byte array containing the challengeHash signature or null if a signature could not be generated.
